titleStmt.title: The Last will and testament of the late deceased French jackanaps who was wont to attend the bears with certain instructions to succeeding English apes : published to prevent the counterfeiting the said will and testament, and to obviate the false slanders of such who maliciously give out that he died intestate / taken in short-hand by a zealous scribe who used to take sermon notes out of the grave mouths of Father Hugh Peters and Father Venner.

The Last will and testament of the late deceased French jackanaps who was wont to attend the bears with certain instructions to succeeding English apes : published to prevent the counterfeiting the said will and testament, and to obviate the false slanders of such who maliciously give out that he died intestate / taken in short-hand by a zealous scribe who used to take sermon notes out of the grave mouths of Father Hugh Peters and Father Venner.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for May-day, and are to be sold in Hide-Park,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
